message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product for a limited time at a price of $10,000. I believe this product will be highly beneficial for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this lower price?
Bob, I understand your position, but the product's value is truly significant. I could consider letting it go for $9,200.  This is my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am still unable to exceed $8,000 for the product. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in between?
